ygData.subject: Re: Cast Force
ygData.msgSnippet: Cast Force is lvl 24 DD spell that does over 200hp around 220 or 225 i think. This is only what I have been told but The person who told me this had the spell
ygData.messageBody:
Cast Force is lvl 24 DD spell that does over 200hp around 220 or 225 i
think. This is only what I have been told but The person who told me this
had the spell it can be bought in Neriak

Quindinar

From: Samurai7 <samurai7@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:01 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Cast Force


> From: "Samurai7" <samurai7@...>

make

but

it's
